snippet: Not eight months after Silvio Berlusconi resigned, reports are saying the former prime minister is ready to take another stab at Italy’s top elected position.
abstract: Silvio Berlusconi is ready to take another stab at Italy’s top elected position, nearly eight months after he resigned as prime minister; news reports say that he has been persuaded to jump back into the political fray at the urging of Italy’s business and entrepreneurial community.
lead_paragraph: Not eight months after Silvio Berlusconi resigned, reports are saying the former prime minister is ready to take another stab at Italy’s top elected position.

headline.seo: Silvio Berlusconi Said to Be Plotting a Political Comeback
headline.main: Berlusconi Is Said to Be Plotting a Political Comeback in Italy
headline.print_headline: Berlusconi Is Said to Be Plotting a Political Comeback in Italy, by Popular Demand
